name: AnimeThemesSync
description:
Automatically download OP/ED videos from AnimeThemes.moe to upgrade your collection!
Key Features: - Precise Matching: Uses AniList/MyAnimeList IDs to ensure the correct anime. - Smart Tagging: Automatically adds season tags like 'Winter 2024'. - Direct Links: Quick access to the source pages on AnimeThemes.moe.
overview: Automatically downloads anime OP/ED themes from AnimeThemes.moe for your Jellyfin library.
